meanings.definition: A person who makes or sells gold jewelry or other gold items.
meanings.sent1: The skilled goldsmiths crafted beautiful necklaces and rings.
meanings.sent2: I bought a stunning bracelet from the local goldsmiths.
meanings.sent3: The goldsmiths decided to have a competition to see who could create the most unique piece.
meanings.sent4: Her hands moved like goldsmiths, shaping the metal with precision.
meanings.sent5: The goldsmiths' workshop gleamed with the shine of polished gold.

meanings.definition: The shop or business of a goldsmith.
meanings.sent1: We visited the goldsmiths to pick out our wedding rings.
meanings.sent2: The goldsmiths' storefront displayed a variety of exquisite pieces.
meanings.sent3: The goldsmiths' shop was so busy that they had to hire extra staff.
meanings.sent4: The town's economy thrived due to the success of the goldsmiths.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly crafted jewelry filled the goldsmiths' store.
